product.title: Li’l Wolf and the Three Little Pigs | Disney Book Club by Early Moments
product.text:
Li’l Wolf and the Three Little Pigs

What child doesn’t love the fabled story of the Three Little Pigs? In this fun offshoot, The Big Bad Wolf’s son, Li’l Wolf, is a friend of the three pigs. When he bakes a cake for Practical Pig’s birthday and leaves to take it to the pigs’ cottage, Big Bad Wolf is determined to find his way in. One by one, his schemes—including delivering homemade cookies, disguising himself as a delivery man, and smuggling himself in a package—are thwarted by the clever pigs and Li’l Wolf. By the end of the book, Li’l Wolf has taught his father a valuable lesson about the negative impacts of bullying.

Tie-in Activity: Work with your child to identify safe, effective strategies for dealing with bullies. Conversely, make sure he knows how important it is to never engage in bullying behavior.
